events.title: Heavy Rotation (Opening)
events.short_description: Opening of 3hd’s “Heavy Rotation” exhibition exploring conceptual tension between gravity and orbit.
events.description: Opening night of Creamcake’s group exhibition “Heavy Rotation” at Haus der Visionäre. The show examines the conceptual friction between weight and motion, featuring works by Emily Barker, Johannes Büttner, Romeo Roxman Gatt, Tirdad Hashemi & Soufia Erfanian, Joshua Woolford with Sippin’ T and Lie Ning, and Zuzanna Czebatul

events.title: Dead God Flow (Oct 2-5)
events.short_description: Audiovisual installation by Christelle Oyiri combining video, sound and spatial design, open Thursday–Sunday 12:00–20:00.
events.description: LAS Art Foundation presents Christelle Oyiri's first Berlin installation 'Dead God Flow' at CANK Berlin. This audiovisual environment features the videos 'Hauntology of an OG' and 'Hyperfate', exploring rap history, martyrdom, and imagined futures through sound, image and spatial design. Open Thursday–Sunday 12:00–20:00.

events.title: Nausea
events.short_description: Performance evening exploring Sartre’s existential nausea through dance, sound, and ritual.
events.description: Creamcake’s performance evening “Nausea” channels existential crisis into collaborative reconstruction. Works include caner teker’s 'Kirkpinar', Kinlaw’s endurance-driven 'gut ccheck', Sippin’ T’s navigation of becoming, and Zein Majali’s audiovisual mapping of digital disorientation.

events.title: CTM Festival presents Exponential Function
events.short_description: Immersive warehouse rave by CTM & 3hd using spatial DJ mixer with artists like ¥ØU$UK€ ¥UK1MAT$U and SHERELLE.
events.description: CTM and 3hd festivals join forces for 'Exponential Function', an immersive rave at Haus der Visionäre. DJs including ¥ØU$UK€ ¥UK1MAT$U, SHERELLE, Minna‑no‑Kimochi, DJ Fuckoff and mi‑el perform using the new Ambrio spatial DJ mixer on a d&b Soundscape system, creating 360° sound with light scenography.

events.title: KAREOKI AT THE SLAGHEAP (Open Call)
events.short_description: Three‑hour workshop blending theatre, choreography and sound, culminating in a live group performance.
events.description: In this open‑call workshop, Bianca Scout invites participants to a dystopian 'KAREOKI AT THE SLAGHEAP', mixing theatre, choreography, sound and movement. All bodies are welcome to explore horror, fantasy and rebellion; bring comfortable clothes and optional gear for this intense, imaginative session.

events.title: Shifting Ground
events.short_description: Double-bill performance exploring transformation on unstable terrain with pieces by Lewis Walker and Johanna Hedva.
events.description: Part of 3hd festival’s performance program, 'Shifting Ground' at HAU Hebbel am Ufer features Lewis Walker’s gymnastics-based 'Bornsick', exploring inherited illness and identity, and Johanna Hedva’s musical theatre piece 'Fist' (with George R. Miller), blending dominatrix blues and swampy heartbreak. Expect loud sounds and strobe lights.

events.title: Care Circuit
events.short_description: Performance evening exploring empathy and compassion with works by Ewa Dziarnowska, Ludwig Wandinger & Yves B Golden, and Star & Stan.
events.description: Creamcake’s 'Care Circuit' invites audiences to explore self‑compassion and collective healing. It features Ewa Dziarnowska’s 'This resting, patience Étude', Ludwig Wandinger and Yves B Golden’s stripped‑down performance 'Mug', and Star & Stan’s 'MOONLIGHT FUEL', emphasising presence, vulnerability, and relational resilience.

events.title: Regulation Loop
events.short_description: Club night exploring feedback and balance with performances by Bianca Scout, Tati au Miel, DJ Paypal and others.
events.description: 3hd’s 'Regulation Loop' club night draws on systems theory and the body’s balance mechanism. Music and dance performances by Bianca Scout, Tati au Miel, Rosa Pistola, Total XTC, softchaos, creo en todo and DJ Paypal create an environment where rhythm and movement act as self‑regulating forces amid social and technological upheaval.
